PROFILE.INFO: I am Systems Engineer focused on front-end development, specializing in Angular. Proficient in frameworks and technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, with knowledge of Node.js, React, Java, and .NET. I have strong problem-solving and teamwork skills, experience in object-oriented programming, and a commitment to writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
